metadata.name: Give me your hand
metadata.description:
On behalf of those affected by the disaster, we would like to express our sincere gratitude to all supporters and stand by them during this difficult time. Your generosity and kindness will make a profound difference in the lives of those who have lost so much. Your contributions will give families the strength and resources they need to rebuild their homes and begin the healing process after the loss of their loved ones. We thank you from the bottom of our hearts for your support and compassion. Your generosity will always be remembered and appreciated. This token is a little thank you from us to the donors.

100% of the proceeds and royalties go to aid organizations.
